body_html:
@ethanluoyc [the empty] event_shape for Normal is confusing

Thanks, that's good to know! We do need more documentation about batch_shape and event_shape before 0.4 release, and I'll try to add further explanation. (I'm writing similar docs for Pyro this week).

body:
> @ethanluoyc  [the empty] `event_shape` for Normal is confusing

Thanks, that's good to know! We do need more documentation about batch_shape and event_shape before 0.4 release, and I'll try to add further explanation. (I'm writing similar docs for Pyro this week).
